      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.json.JSONObject fetchNewData()

      static boolean generateDatabase()
      Automatically generates a bus_stopdb.properties database

      It will take a while (probably a lot of time) to generate a database.
      It is not recommended to implement with the application programmatically.
      java.lang.String getArrivalTime_Formatted() 
      ArrivalTime getArrivalTime() 
      java.lang.String getArrivalTimeRemaining_Formatted()
      Get arrival time remaining

      Returns a string with this format:
      RR min(s)
      which RR is the remaining time.

      Different cases to return another string:
      ---: If srvhr, srvmin, arrhr, arrmin is -1
      Arrived: If remainMin smaller or equal to 0
      int getArrivalTimeRemaining_Min()
      Calculates the remaining arrival minutes left.

      Using the time from KMB Datafeed Server

      static boolean loadDatabase(boolean fromClassResources) 
      static boolean loadDatabase(java.lang.Object parent, boolean fromClassResources)
      Load database from class-path or file-system

      It is automatically called if the database in the memory is null.
      Must be called before any database reading events.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ArrivalManager

        public ArrivalManager(java.lang.String busno,
                      java.lang.String stop_code,
                      int bound,
                      int language)
               throws InvalidArrivalTargetException,
                      CouldNotLoadDatabaseException
        Creates a new ArrivalManager instance.
        Parameters:
        busno - Bus No.
        stop_code - Bus Stop Code (e.g. WO04N12500), probably it is specified from a BUS DB source.
        bound - Bus Direction/Bound (1 or 2)
        language - Language to be selected ArrivalManager.ENGLISH_LANG or ArrivalManager.CHINESE_LANG
        Throws:
        InvalidArrivalTargetException - If the specified target arrival was invalid
        CouldNotLoadDatabaseException - If the API could not load the database

        Send a request to fetch a new bus arrival ETA data
        Returns:
        JSONObject with the bus arrival ETA

      • getArrivalTimeRemaining_Formatted

        public java.lang.String getArrivalTimeRemaining_Formatted()
        Get arrival time remaining

        Returns a string with this format:
        RR min(s)
        which RR is the remaining time.

        Different cases to return another string:
        ---: If srvhr, srvmin, arrhr, arrmin is -1
        Arrived: If remainMin smaller or equal to 0
        Returns:
        A String with the format mentioned above

      • getArrivalTimeRemaining_Min

        public int getArrivalTimeRemaining_Min()
        Calculates the remaining arrival minutes left.

        Using the time from KMB Datafeed Server
        Returns:
        Remaining minutes

      • getArrivalTime_Formatted

        public java.lang.String getArrivalTime_Formatted()
                                          throws NoETADataFetchedError,
                                                 NoServerTimeFetchedError
        Throws:
        NoETADataFetchedError
        NoServerTimeFetchedError

      • getBusStopBuses

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getBusStopBuses()
        Get all the buses of this ArrivalManager's bus stop

        Returns a list with nothing if no buses match the bus-stop code
        Returns:
        List

      • getETAdata

        public static org.json.JSONObject getETAdata(java.lang.String route,
                                             java.lang.String busStopCode,
                                             int lang,
                                             int bound,
                                             int stop_seq)
        Get ETA data from KMB server. And save to memory for other functions.

        Must be called before any ETA reading events
        Parameters:
        route - The bus number / route name / bus name
        busStopCode - The bus-stop code
        lang - Language to be received. KmbApi.ENGLISH_LANG / KmbApi.CHINESE_LANG
        bound - Bus-Line Bound
        stop_seq - Bus-stop sequence
        Returns:
        JSONObject

      • generateDatabase

        public static boolean generateDatabase()
        Automatically generates a bus_stopdb.properties database

        It will take a while (probably a lot of time) to generate a database.
        It is not recommended to implement with the application programmatically.
        Returns:
        Boolean whether the database is successfully generated

      • loadDatabase

        public static boolean loadDatabase(java.lang.Object parent,
                                   boolean fromClassResources)
        Load database from class-path or file-system

        It is automatically called if the database in the memory is null.
        Must be called before any database reading events.
        Parameters:
        fromClassResources - Load from Class-path
        parent - A class parent to be specified If true, make sure the bus_stopdb.properties is attached in the class-path.
        If false, make sure the bus_stopdb.properties is inside the working directory.
        Returns:
        Boolean whether the database is successfully loaded.

      • loadDatabase

        public static boolean loadDatabase(boolean fromClassResources)

      • getStopSeq

        public static int getStopSeq(java.lang.String route,
                             int boundno,
                             java.lang.String stopcode)
        Get the bus-stop sequence of the route with the bus-stop code

        Returns -1 if the route or the bus-stop code do not exist.
        Parameters:
        route - The Bus-Stop Number/Name
        boundno - The Bound of the route
        stopcode - The Bus-Stop code
        Returns:
        Integer

        public static java.util.List<java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String[]>>> getBusStopPair()
